Reviews.Title: EasyCap USB 2.0 Capture DVR
Reviews.Author: Michael Joseph
Reviews.Content: Satisfactory product, hardware is great, software is weak. Would be nice if clearer to explain only records on one channel at a time, even though you can view all 4 channels. Attempted third party software solutions, but can only get other programs to recognize channel 2 as a record input. For the price, makes an excellent one channel video capture. If they redesigned the software for 4 cam capture I would be 5 stars satisfied! Compatible with both my XP and Vista 2.0USB computers, not compatible with 1.0 USB.

Reviews.Title: [Worst ever.] NEW REVISED WITH HELP!
Reviews.Author: C. Champion-stucker "minnin"
Reviews.Content: [It never worked the seller was unable to communicate and i don't have the time to file a claim against every rip off con-artist here. BUYER BEWARE! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM.]Ok i have recently discovered that this is not as bad as i thought. With no help from the manufacturer i gave up originally, i put it in my drawer and forgot about it, and then I'm like lets try it again. I hooked it up to my usb 2.0 hub and then i tried the  Multiviewer software and no luck. Read the steps below if you use vista or windows 7.1. go to the shortcut on your desktop or the program in C://programs/... and right click2. then go to properties near or at the bottom3. first click the tab at top reading compatibility4. first select the box next to "Run this program in compatibility mode for"5. then click the box under and make sure it says Windows XP can be normal or SP26. after you select Windows XP go to the bottom of the "Multiviewer Properties" window and then check the box next to "Run this program as an administrator7. click apply at the bottom and then once apply has gone gray click on OK8. try and run the program and it will work fine and ?'s send mail to minnin15@temp-mail.tk

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for $400 software driven DVR system, this item is not for you. If you are looking for something basic to record up to 4 channels, look no further! I see a lot of reviews about this item where the person is demanding/expecting all sorts of features,its a $10 product! It installed with no hitches at all, within 3 minutes up and running and recording (Win XP). Mine came set to PAL, so be sure to check your settings. I recorded over 8hrs last night and it came out to a 2 gig avi file. During the day recording, it seems the files will be smaller. The software is very basic, you have your 4 channels and a few options off to the side mostly snapshot/picture stuff. I got this for under $15, and it does the most important thing....record with great quality(camera permitting).

Reviews.Title: So close yet so far...
Reviews.Author: Joseph St Lucas
Reviews.Content: As others have said, s/w is weak.  I bought this to upload my four outside cameras to a website.  In order to do this, I need a constant filename.  I had been using an ancient snappy w. snapcap s/w with a video switcher to upload to my website but the snappy started having problems.  This device lets you view all four channels at once, and will save a jpg of the channels at a timed interval.  However, you can't name this jpg what you want, it defaults to date/time format, no matter what.  You can manually name a shot, but since I wanted a jpg at five minute intervals, this is too much manual for me.  It will also not ftp automatically, but there's other free s/w to do that.  Computer is a 1.2ghz pentium running XP.  No other s/w except my weather station s/w runs on this so there appears to be lots of computing power for the app.  Three *'s for this.Update: Worked with limitations as stated above for two months, then suddenly died.  Will not get recognized by XP anymore, another computer will not see it either.  Because of the limited lifetime I lowered my review *'s.

Reviews.Title: Poor investestment for DVR
Reviews.Author: DO NOT BUY FROM THESE LIARS!
Reviews.Content: I purchased this DVR with great intentions and was absolutely dissapointed with the lack of instruction and customer support. It states that windows 7 is compatible do not be fooled it will not work with windows 7. I have made numerous attempts to locate and install drivers from both their website and the internet and still no luck installing the software on my computer. There is nobody to talk to if you need help with the installation or if you just have basic questions regarding the product. There is a forum on there website that is suppossed to help, I couldn't find any thing that helped. I cannot speak for other systems I am using a Dell Inspirion 17R with windows 7. This might be the perfect product for someone using an older operating system. The actual device itself seemed to be ok and I recieved my item in about 2 days however good luck trying to figure out the installation and software. If there is something I can say that would help the seller is that they must create a better website that is more user freindly and establish some sort of customer service to assist people with software and installation. And for the buyers, if you are running windows 7 probably will not install correctly. I hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: EasyCap 4 channel USB DVR
Reviews.Author: Charlie Harper
Reviews.Content: DVR worked as advertised. Software was easy to use. Nothing fancy but a good product to get your feet wet with CCTV cameras. Be aware,you can view four cameras but it will only record one camera at a time.

Reviews.Title: Video capture
Reviews.Author: toocal
Reviews.Content: This product works as described. It was easy to install and work from first set up. I use it with Windows 7 and have not encountered any problems so far. If you have a need or desire to use video surveillance from multiple cameras this is a great tool. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: works on Vista 32
Reviews.Author: Dejan Vukovic
Reviews.Content: Works on Vista 32, but not 64! other software records only on 2 channel. Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: fast delivery, great price.
Reviews.Author: zmkr788
Reviews.Content: I got my EasyCap today and immediately installed it on my Dell Dimension 3000, first I disabled my antivirus as indicated on the instructions, next I plugged the easycap into an usb port, I got a prompt asking me to insert the cd with the drivers, and after putting the cd into the drive, it started the installation process, before completing the installation it will ask you to unplug the easycap so the installer can finish, then it will ask you to plug the easycap once the installation is finished, I closed the installer and went to my start menu to start the MultiViewer once the multiviewer was displayed on the screen it was asking me for an username and password, but somehow it dissappeared after a while and the image from my camera came thru, it took me about four hours to get the easy cap working and recording, it works, just have some coffee and patience, having my three year old rushing me was fun, but now I can use the vast storage capacity of my hard drive to keep an eye on my stuff while I'm gone, great product but I have to admit, there were moments when I thought it would not work at all.

Reviews.Title: memory
Reviews.Author: dannevis
Reviews.Content: this dongle also uses way to much memory 21gb in less than an hour advice on formating for less memory use would be valuable!!

Reviews.Title: Asks for License key
Reviews.Author: VRW
Reviews.Content: After opening the mulitviewer program and closing it I get a screen that says the software has expired....enter product key.  Has anyone else had this problem?There is no key and no place to enter one!

Reviews.Title: Does NOT appears to be what you think
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a trial version. I said to my self to try a $15.to gamble,,,,,I lost. The instructions that came with the product are for a different item.(HDE) you suck. Try to collect donation instead selling stuff you are not aware off.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!! not worth the effort
Reviews.Author: Daniel G Monroe
Reviews.Content: Glad I'm not the only one!!! Purchased this thing two years ago. It smelled like burnt electronics as soon as i opened the packaging. device wasn't detected by any of the computers i connected it to, regardless of O/S...I'm not surprised! Wasn't worth my time or money to track down tech support or get a refund.

Reviews.Title: Save your money and buy something else
Reviews.Author: JohDoe
Reviews.Content: This product did not work with win-xp and I was unable to return product.  Customer contact number was not even a vaild number.  Not Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Works Great !
Reviews.Author: Mr_seymorehiney
Reviews.Content: Easy install user friendly software,one exception the password was not printed on the CD envelope as stated, Just leave the master password blank and change it to your own.

Reviews.Title: works on server 2012
Reviews.Author: bitupset
Reviews.Content: The only reason i write this is because it is the ONLY capture device I've found that runs on server 2012 R2 without having to disable the signed driver requirement...if the server re-boots, the device loads back up and works as advertised.BDA has to be loaded first, FYI.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: gBo
Reviews.Content: just like it says its very easy to install an most computers. If you get one be smart and buy a WD blue 500 gig or better  hard drive for the camera files. The quality is in the camera itself.

Reviews.Title: Not an Easycap
Reviews.Author: Fastcar 360 "ElectronicJunky"
Reviews.Content: These are not an EasyCap usb grabber.  Easy caps are based on the STK1160 chip and these are not the correct ones.  These will not work with Linux.  If you are looking for a STK1160 based chip us the Sabrent USB-AVCPT A/V-to-USB 2.0 Digital Video Adapter.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: question
Reviews.Content: It says "Compatible with Windows 2000 / XP / Vista 32 bit"not trueI struggled with this for hours using XP32 bit and windows 2000 and finally gave up.  It appears to be incorrect drivers, some of them but then it does not recognize itself and somagic did not respond to the emails I sent to them.This is the second video cap product of this type I gambled on from china and wont make that mistake again.

Reviews.Title: i didnt like it
Reviews.Author: Lester Bowling
Reviews.Content: it didnt work for what i needed it for. would not recommend this product to any one. . . .

Reviews.Title: no work
Reviews.Author: israel
Reviews.Content: i try it and it dont work with w7, it keep saing, the driver was not install proper and there is not online help is ps

Reviews.Title: Very cheap! Works. Would buy if need for short period of time.
Reviews.Author: rodwarrix "Rod Warrix"
Reviews.Content: I would still recommend this even thou it is really cheap. It's still easy to use and had me doing a good day time watch of my house and car. But at night it will just black out! The software did capture and motion detection worked over time which I liked because I saved all the motion pictures and was able to tell what was going on. I'd get this to start for a short period of time until I got a better cheap system that also gave out and then moved on to a Zmodo 8ch which is great! (The blacking out might not happen if in very well lite area! Must be bright!)

Reviews.Title: Poor standards
Reviews.Author: Leon Kendrick
Reviews.Content: The product came with a viewing software that required a password.  It would not allow me to create an ID and password and there was nothing in the documentation stating what the ID and password were.  Moreover the documentation was obtuse, and one could tell that it was written by an individual who has a very poor grasp of english.  I have the product, but I cannot use it.  I would never order it again, nor would I recommend the product to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Does not work - and it killed my Windows XP install.
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I don't know how it did it, but after installing the drivers for this unit.  My computer would not boot.

Reviews.Title: Easy Cap 4 Channel
Reviews.Author: Gordon
Reviews.Content: I bought this adapter 2 years ago and it worked fine on XP. I recently loaded it on another computer with XP and 2 with Vista. It won't work. The program comes up but has no video feed. Can't download any drivers. What's the deal?

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: JOHN DOE
Reviews.Content: It wont focus and there isnt a adjustment for fine tune it. I could not even make out my truck in the driveway. It was just a blur. and they wont refund for shipping eather. This is a very shady person that WILL ignor your email. When i finally got a responce, this person pretty much called me a lier. I give them 2 thumbs down so beware cause its junk!

Reviews.Title: An adapter without support to OS 7 and 8
Reviews.Author: Juan Eduardo Muselli R.
Reviews.Content: According to what mentions and is seen in advertising or adapter details, details that works with all operating systems, and works the cameras, what does not work is the recorder, because it does not exist in the operating systems will not record codecs suitable for this Chinese model of adapter, which does not have support for this type of failure page.

Reviews.Title: STOP DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Very Bad item  it's just awful  i have owned a computer store for almost 13 years  and this item  is pure junk  dont buy it

Reviews.Title: Basic Video Feed with Basic Software
Reviews.Author: NERD911 "NERD911"
Reviews.Content: My intent was to try and use this unit to stream video surveillance through [...] which is a brilliant web subscription service and application based recording.  But I was unable to make it work properly.  At its intended purpose, it will do just fine, but the software could use more work/features.

Reviews.Title: Complete Dud
Reviews.Author: Kaio
Reviews.Content: Yes, I downloaded every driver known out there -- and no, none of them worked.  This thing must be a counterfeit; that, or it's just a complete piece of junk and waste of silicone.  I did get it working, here and there, but it was VERY persnickety and even forced me to do a couple system restores, just to eradicate the damage it did to my system.  Good thing it wasn't being installed on my main computer.  Complete waste of time and money.  The seller gave me a full refund and told me to not bother sending it back, and just toss it in the trash.  Kinda made me think this happens to them a lot with this one, cuz they know it's junk too.  Avoid.

Reviews.Title: Could not get it to work.
Reviews.Author: Kristofer Occhipinti
Reviews.Content: I bought this even though it had bad reviews.  Lots of times products get bad reviews because people expect to much out of them.  This was under $10 so I didn't expect too much from it. But, it did not work at all.  I tried it on 2 different machines.  Normally I would not give it a bad review for that.  There are going to be defective products every once and awhile.  Doesn't mean the product itself is bad.  But with all the reviews saying it doesn't work, and then having mine not work tells me that it's the product itself and not just a random defective product.

Reviews.Title: hardware works great software not so good
Reviews.Author: kspike
Reviews.Content: Like the title says I cannot complain about the Hardware it works great no issues. But the software something called 'smi superviewer/multiviewer' starts loads my camera views but if i try to do anything it wants a username and password which I've tried every possible combo i can think of to no result. I believe i will be returning it.

Reviews.Title: great device for the price
Reviews.Author: TPilcher
Reviews.Content: I just got this today, after some of the reveiws I have read I was worried about the ease of use and install. I am running VISTA 32bit and all I had to do was plug it into the usb when it asked for the install disc I put it in the drive and was up and going in just a few minutes. The only down fall I have found so far is the multiveiwer software it works ok but, you cannot change the administrator login or password, also the multiveiwer panel is too small and will not let you change the size. for under $10.00 this thing is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Not very good
Reviews.Author: Dan "Dan"
Reviews.Content: The product does work but has two major flaws. The video quality is is much worse when viewed through this adapter. When I plug the camera directly into the monitor, the video is much better than through the this adapter. The software included with this product also does not allow you to make the video inputs full screen so it is very hard to discern what is in the video.

Reviews.Title: 1 STAR IS THE LOWEST RATING????
Reviews.Author: originalindividual
Reviews.Content: I AM PRETTY SURE THAT THE TITLE FOR THIS REVIEW SAYS IT ALL. BUNK PRODUCT AND THE SOFTWARE THAT IT COMES WITH ISNT EVEN EVERYTHING YOU NEED. IF YOU WANT THIS HDE EasyCap Model 002 - 4 Channel USB 2.0 DVR Video Audio CCTV Capture Adapter THEN GET READY FOR A FUN...OR NOT...TIME

Reviews.Title: This product is a piece of JUNK.
Reviews.Author: T. Sipos
Reviews.Content: This product does not work at all. It is impossible to use on windows 7. It is a big fat waste of time and your hard earned money. There is no setup instructions. DO NOT BUY!!! PIECE OF JUNK.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: If you want a recording software with good quality and reliability, DO NOT BUY THIS!It gave my computer a virus and it wouldn't work with my wii or my dvd player. I will never trust this seller ever!

Reviews.Title: very impressive for the price
Reviews.Author: Gregory B. "GMB"
Reviews.Content: Mine arrived very quickly. I installed it on a old amd system running win XP. I have 2 different cameras and one does better than the other (but the camera that is darker is 640x480 and therefore does not fall in the specs listed as supported: but i do get an image). On initial install it did not work, but the default for camera type needed to be changed. My cameras were ntsc. Install defaulted to a PAL selection for the camera. The product appears to support viewing only one camera at a time even if all four are displayed. There is an auto feature that will cycle thru each camera giving a snapshot of each in about 3 second intervals. Overall this likely a good product for some people. Benefits that I see are... Some of the more energy saving systems are "bookshelf" systems where you cannot add cards into the computer. Even if you have a low power desktop that can be upgraded with a card, the cards normally cost at least 6x more [price at time of purchase was under $8]. The software may not be stellar but I think that this is a great product for a DIY where you want to control the costs of the initial setup of a security system or other project until you determine what capabilities you may want/need in the future.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: nelson
Reviews.Content: I love this product, as we saw on the internet, perfect and arrived in the stipulated time, I recommend this product and this online store to me is excellent, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: The software came with is just useless
Reviews.Author: B. Kalapurakkal
Reviews.Content: It is not the original EasyCap, which I really don't care, but the software that came with is just useless. You could see all the inputs, but that's it! You can't setup any security feature on that software. Looks like a fake software, so tried to use another freeware application,but only recorgnizes input from channel 2.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it! It's a waste of time.
Reviews.Author: Aztlan
Reviews.Content: I must admit I purchased two of these EasyCap thinking maybe I could make them work. I installed it on System 7 does NOT work like they say BUT it did not work on my Windows XP either so I was sure it would work on my windows vista old computer which I would dedicate to just monitor the cameras. There it worked for 1 day as a camera monitor, I could see all 4 cameras and very dark views. The cameras looked much better before just being plugged to the TV AV input. The easycap never recorded anything and the day after it would not work. I tried both EasyCaps and none worked so I returned both. If you don't want to waste time like me DON'T BUY IT, get something else.

Reviews.Title: Just don't know
Reviews.Author: VinceB
Reviews.Content: I would like to give an honest review of this product, but actually I never got it installed. The small cd they sent was bad and I couldn't load the software. I searched the internet for the freeware version and nothing found. So back it goes.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this
Reviews.Author: mad
Reviews.Content: i got one i cause not get this to work at all the cd did down load but the easymodel 002 4 ch dvr video audio cctv captuure i call them up to ask them if thay can take over my pc and get this up and runing for me my pc is olny a 1 year old pc thay did not fine out why it will not work at all on my home pc it haad win 7 in it i what to bestbuy and i what to fine out if it will work on there pc thay put it on 9 there pc thay had at bestbuy and it will not work at all i call them back up to have ups to pick this up i what my $ back i olny had for 14h to ups pick it up it took 3 day for them get it and 2 days get my $ back from crownemergencyservice never buy this keep your $

Reviews.Title: Garbage Counterfeit
Reviews.Author: djdragonfire13
Reviews.Content: Bought this thinking I'd take a chance, seeing as some people could get it to work and I'm pretty good at wriggling around my computer settings. No. Just no no no no. Come to find out it's counterfeit,not the real EZCap product. Tried just about every driver out there on the great interwebs, while running Windows 7 64x.

Reviews.Title: EasyCap002
Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: This item is not the one i was trying to order. It did not work. I was looking for the EZcap, this is not it. I was I was irritated to get this because I was so excited to hook it up & use it, just for it to not work. I ended up having to spend more money on the real thing. On the rating, i wanted 0 stars, they made me at least put one.

Reviews.Title: No Manual, No Software, Just The Item
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Item came with no manual, no software, no nothing just the usb device in a postal mailer.  doesn't work at all.  DO NOT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Drivers/Software ?
Reviews.Author: Moleman
Reviews.Content: Could not get 4 channels to work - just a single channel.  Searched high and low for Windows 7 drivers but with what I found, could not get 4 channels to work.  And Multiviewer software could not find device.

Reviews.Title: No Funciona
Reviews.Author: Oswaldo Araya Rojas "TRES PLUMAS"
Reviews.Content: No sirve, no da imagen, se instala y no me da imagen, lo he probado con diferentes camaras, tambien he reinstalado los drivers en XP, no hay forma de que funcione, inviertan su dinero en otra cosa.

Reviews.Title: It works for me!
Reviews.Author: G. Haskins
Reviews.Content: Well, this is a device for capturing video from other sources, it does the quality that it receives, but for me it had been fine. The application is not as easy, but it is really nice. I had not been able to record 4 ch video at the  same time, nor i had configured it for sending emails, but it really Works! I have Win XP, so no opinion about Win 7.  I do really recommend this for video capture.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: kitty
Reviews.Content: I purchased the security camera and this adapter was recommended. It didn't work. First of all, the cable ends were male, same as for the camera. I had to find another cable to connect the two. They provided the CD-rom for installation but it's only for the USB connection software. So basically, it installed the software for that adapter. When I connected the camera, it didn't even show any image, just the screen for the software itself. Apparently, I need another software for the video which wasn't included in my package. And the manual booklet stating that it would be included. I tried to contact the seller and heard nothing from them.

Reviews.Title: surveillance, video security
Reviews.Author: JPenn
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. This item will not work with all cameras (higer res, or more scan lines). Motion detection is flaky at best. Not even worth sending back because the postage will cost as much as the item. It may work better with upgraded software though. I have yet to find it useful. Computer: 1.8G Intel 1G of Ram. This may be good for someone who wants to watch four cameras in realtime without the record feature or use manual record option.

Reviews.Title: Viewing Only
Reviews.Author: Matthew G. Christensen "mgc6288"
Reviews.Content: For the money, it isn't bad.  It is very BASIC.  It will only work with the Multiviewer software included as I've tried multiple brands and only channel 2 works with them.  It only records on whichever camera is selected so really this is only a good purchase if you want VIEW ONLY.  I would give 1 star for features/functionality and 5 stars for the picture quality which is why I gave 3.

Reviews.Title: Easy Cap Sucks
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: Cannot get any drivers for this. Using Win XP Virtual Machine. Nothing works, plain and simple at that. Causes BSOD in Win 7 too.

Reviews.Title: Does what is says and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Jack Rhody "Lburg"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to learn how to set up a dvr security system.  This was easy to use and works well.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: shopper
Reviews.Content: Broke within 1 week!Do not buy EasyCap Model 002 - 4 Channel USB 2.0 DVR Video Audio CCTV Capture Adapter.

Reviews.Title: vista compliant my axx!
Reviews.Author: E. Handel "zapeee"
Reviews.Content: After two hours of trying different things, i cannot get the drivers to install on my laptop running vista64.  good luck.

Reviews.Title: Not for Vista
Reviews.Author: Paultex
Reviews.Content: In spite of the fact that it says it will work on Vista, It Will Not. You can hear audio but not picture.

Reviews.Title: NOT Windows 7 Compatible
Reviews.Author: Rick1971
Reviews.Content: and I did look for the correct driver, best I found was a driver that allowed it to work but did not allow you to use the surveillance software, and the pic is so dark (during the day)that it seems like looking across the ocean at night for a floating football without a light, you can see something moving, but can make out what it is, if you have Win 7 don't get this, if you have Vista or XP it may work well, but I now have a new paper weight and yes I did try to talk to the seller but he did not respond to me and it have been over a weekI would have rated it a 0, not they wont let me

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: clark
Reviews.Content: the price is fitting for this device because it does not work. Tried with windows xp. Do not buy this product. Wish I could suggest an alternative but haven't found one.

Reviews.Title: A peice of junk
Reviews.Author: rt2012
Reviews.Content: this thing is not even worth $4.70 it does not work with anythingI tried 3 different computers 3 different systems don't waste your time or money.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: This is pure crap. Its not even worth sending back.It will not work for multiple cameras as the Multiviewer software does not work for Windows 7. The software is ancient and worthless.Save yourself the trouble and purchase a DVR unit.You have been warned.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work with windows 7 64 bit
Reviews.Author: Keith R. Brown "KRB"
Reviews.Content: don't waste your money and time. I tried several times to install this software, and the tiny disk they sent wouldn't even work in my HP laptop. I tried using another cd/dvd usb unit and the driver won't work on win 7 64 bit, can't find one to download. These companies that sell out of date equipment should be kicked off amazon.

Reviews.Title: Slack
Reviews.Author: Fiveash
Reviews.Content: I received the device with no software so it is basically useless. I wouldn't recommend this crap to anyone. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Easy Crap
Reviews.Author: dave b.
Reviews.Content: What a pice of crap...And "Easy"..I think not. Tried for two days with thier support poeple..Do This... Do That.. yeah right. I wish they would have told me it was junk right off so I wouldn't have wasted my time. Don't bother with this item it is worthless. I'm running win 7 64 bit and Ubuntu Linux 11.10. Didn't try it in linux, didn't want to chance toasting it.Ripped!! again!!

Reviews.Title: No lo recomiendo
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: Me parece que es un producto muy complicado para que funcione.Molesta mucho con el directx.No intente que funcione en server pq no funcionara.

Reviews.Title: Worst Product ever
Reviews.Author: michaeld83
Reviews.Content: There is nothing good about this product. I have spent hours trying to get this item to function with no success

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: untrustingsoul2009
Reviews.Content: Seems all great and stuff. I have two computers. One runs vista home premium 32 bit, the other 7 64 bit. Will not work with any 64 bit version. There are no known drivers available. Unable to contact manufacturer. Thought I was getting a good deal but instead I wasted my money. I know it's only 8 dollars but still, that's money wasted for something that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: USB "MOTION CAPTURE?" REALLY!?
Reviews.Author: J. P. Rice "MADASHELL"
Reviews.Content: This is a knock off piece of chinese CRAP!first... it took me about 4 hours to install it on windows xp.THEN... I couldnt even get it to show video.I spent about 20 total hours trying to get this to work. And i have 2 degrees in computer science!I dont even want my money back thats how pissed i am about this product

Reviews.Title: Puesto a prueba del producto
Reviews.Author: Martin Araya
Reviews.Content: Instale EasyCap pero con el inconveniente que a la hora de ver las cuatro cámaras trabajando solo se puede ver una a la vez operando ya que desactiva las otras tres. Esto con el inconveniente que uno no puede tener a la vista lo que sucede en los cuatro puntos al mismo tiempo. Revise la configuración y por lo menos yo no pude encontrar como poner a trabajar las cuatro en movimiento a la vez. El producto es muy practico de utilizar pero tope con este inconveniente lastima tenía muchas ilusiones con él.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Hugo Henriquez "Hugo Henriquez"
Reviews.Content: Recomiendo mucho este producto, además recomiendo al vendedor. Para que te funcione debes tener -como en el manual lo explica- un puerto usb de 2.0Puedes conectar hasta un máximo de 4 cámaras, e incluso puedes poner en uno de los puertos, la señal de tu cable de tv (si tiene salida rca). El software que trae ya está hecho para monitorear los 4 puertos que puedes configurar!!!!
